thread.title: BRIEF-Sabra Health Care REIT Qtrly Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.66

title: BRIEF-Sabra Health Care REIT Qtrly Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.66
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Sabra Health Care REIT Inc:
* SABRA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS; CLOSES ON ENLIVANT INVESTMENTS; PROVIDES UPDATE ON CCP MERGER EXECUTION; PROVIDES UPDATE ON GENESIS EXODUS; UPDATES 2018 EARNINGS GUIDANCE
* Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.60 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.67 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY FFO PER SHARE $0.60 * QTRLY NORMALIZED FFO PER SHARE $0.66 * SEES ‍2018 FFO SHR $2.31 TO $2.39; AFFO SHR $2.15 TO $2.23 AND NORMALIZED AFFO SHR $2.28 TO $2.36​
* FY2018 FFO SHR VIEW $2.49 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
